title: Developer's public report; request for hearing by
context: [ยง514B-55] Developer&rsquo;s public report; request for hearing by developer. If an effective date for a developer&rsquo;s public report is not issued within a reasonable time after compliance with registration requirements, or if the developer is materially grieved by the form or content of the developer&rsquo;s public report, the developer, in writing, may request and shall be given a hearing by the commission within a reasonable time after receipt of the request. [L 2005, c 93, pt of ยง3]
